name: Engine
description: Core engine assembly and internal components, including block, head, valvetrain, and rotating assembly.

name: Intake
description: Air intake system components including manifolds, throttle bodies, and aftermarket intake assemblies.

name: Fuelling
description: Fuel delivery components such as injectors, pumps, rails, and fuel system upgrades.

name: Exhaust
description: Exhaust system components including manifolds, headers, catalytic housings, and mufflers.

name: Transmission
description: Gearbox, torque converter, clutch assemblies, and drivetrain interfaces.

name: Body
description: Body panels, exterior trim, bumpers, glass, mirrors, and related hardware.

name: Chassis
description: Vehicle structural components including subframes, crossmembers, and reinforcement parts.

name: Suspension & Steering
description: Suspension components such as control arms, dampers, springs, and performance suspension kits.

name: Braking System
description: Brake system hardware including calipers, master cylinders, and performance brake assemblies.

name: Wheels & Tyres
description: Wheels, tyres, wheel bearings, hubs, and related mounting hardware.

name: Ignition
description: Ignition system components including coils, plugs, leads, and ignition modules.

name: Electrical & Control
description: Vehicle control modules, wiring looms, sensors, and electronic upgrade components.
